text.title: Sign in
text.subtitle: Enter your email and password to access your account

errors.emailInvalid: Please enter a valid email address
errors.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 6 characters

text.title: Create account
text.subtitle: Enter your information to create your account
text.successMessage: Registration successful! Please login with your credentials.

errors.nameMinLength: Name must be at least 2 characters
errors.nameMaxLength: Name must be less than 100 characters
errors.nameInvalid: Name can only contain letters and spaces
errors.emailInvalid: Please enter a valid email address
errors.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 6 characters
errors.passwordMaxLength: Password must be less than 100 characters
errors.passwordComplexity: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, and one number

text.title: Forgot Password
text.subtitle: Enter your email address and we'll send you a link to reset your password
text.successMessage: Password reset link has been sent to your email address.

errors.emailInvalid: Please enter a valid email address
errors.sendFailed: Failed to send reset link. Please try again.

text.title: Dashboard Insights

text.description: The page you are looking for does not exist or has been moved.
text.helpText: If you believe this is an error, please contact support.
